description.narrative: • Create a learning model for the LIT initiative • Generate relevant evidence, to assess the effects of the initiative on teacher performance, and understand its influence on student's learning • Establish a process of continuous learning, involving both beneficiaries and stakeholders, with the aim of gradually improving the effectiveness of the initiative • Generate policy-relevant knowledge for the initiative and for policy makers more generally, working on secondary education in Rwanda and beyond
